an3.100:1.1: Yo → yo kho (s1-3, km) | yo ca kho (mr)
an3.100:4.1: loṇakapallaṃ → loṇaphalaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), udakamallake → udakakapallake (mr)
an3.100:4.3: taṃ parittaṃ udakaṃ → udakamallake udakaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
an3.100:4.12: loṇakapallena loṇo na assa apeyyo”ti → loṇaṃ nevassa appeyyoti (bj) | loṇaphalena loṇo assa apeyyoti (s1-3, pts1)
